Thai Salmon Salad
Water cress
Spinach
Iceberg lettuce
Red pepper
Cucumber
Fine beans
Fresh basil
Lime
Sesame oil
Pine nuts
Black pepper
Bean thread noodles
Chicken OXO
Dark soy sauce
Salt
Blanche the beans and mix with the other greens. Make a dressing with the lime, sesame oil, pine nuts and pepper.
Cook the noodles and flavour with the OXO, some soy, salt and sesame oil. Mix in with the salad.
Chunk the salmon with sesame oil, some leftover stock from the noodles, a squeeze of lime and black pepper. Microwave covered for about 3 - 4 minutes...
